article_title: Rep. Tom Emmer to perform at MinnRoast 2016

article_metadata.description: Hillary Clinton's emails, John Boehner's skin tone and the Affordable Care Act were just a few topics Rep. Tom Emmer joked about during last year's MinnRoast (see video below). We're pleased to have the congressman from Minnesota's 6th Congressional District back with another hilarious monologue.

og.description: We're pleased to have the congressman from Minnesota's 6th Congressional District back with another hilarious monologue. What will he say during this presidential campaign year?
og.title: Rep. Tom Emmer to perform at MinnRoast 2016
